jd: Hi, Hope you are doing well, We have an opening for “Project Manager”. Below are the requirement details, just go through it & if you feel interested, revert back to me with your updated resume Your earliest reply is highly appreciated. POSITION Project Manager LOCATION Kind of Prussia, PA DURATION 12+ Months INTERVIEW TYPE Video VISA RESTRICTIONS No Sponsorship Available REQUIRED SKILLS Manage medium to large scale enterprise-wide projects - mobilizing resources from different teams, define milestones, create project plans, define project structure, monitor project activity, establish release guidelines, controls, manage release inventory and project closure activities. Ensure compliance with audit requirements, SOX and operational controls. Open to travel locally. Experience Required: 10 to 15+ Years Thanks and Regards, Sudhir Kumar | Sr. Technical Recruiter Delta System & Software, Inc Mail Id: sudhir.kumar@delta-ssi.net www.deltassi.com| USA | Canada | India | Europe | Middle East | Australia |
